headline: BlackRock (BLK): Exploring Valuation Drivers After Recent Share Price Swings
summary: BlackRock (BLK) has seen its stock take investors on a ride recently, with the share price moving in different directions over the past month. What is behind these latest shifts, and what are investors watching for next? See our latest analysis for BlackRock. BlackRock's stock has been a bit of a rollercoaster lately, with shares retreating over the past month but still holding modest gains for the year. Short-term price moves have been mixed, but the bigger picture remains strong with a...

headline: BlackRock turns bearish on long-term Treasuries as AI funding wave looms
summary: The BlackRock Investment Institute said on Tuesday it is turning bearish on long-term U.S. Treasuries, warning a coming wave ​of AI-related financing could put upward pressure on U.S. borrowing costs and exacerbate worries over ‌U.S. government indebtedness.  "Higher borrowing across public and private ⁠sectors is likely to keep upward pressure ‌on interest rates," BII, a division of U.S.-based BlackRock focused on investment research, said in a 2026 global investment outlook report.  "A structurally higher cost of capital raises the cost of AI-related investment and affects the broader economy," it said.

content.title: BlackRock turns bearish on long-term Treasuries as AI funding wave looms
content.summary: The BlackRock Investment Institute said on Tuesday it is turning bearish on long-term U.S. Treasuries, warning a coming wave ​of AI-related financing could put upward pressure on U.S. borrowing costs and exacerbate worries over ‌U.S. government indebtedness.  "Higher borrowing across public and private ⁠sectors is likely to keep upward pressure ‌on interest rates," BII, a division of U.S.-based BlackRock focused on investment research, said in a 2026 global investment outlook report.  "A structurally higher cost of capital raises the cost of AI-related investment and affects the broader economy," it said.

headline: Another MSC-Hutchison Port Deal Heads Toward Antitrust Crosshairs

headline: Robo Advisor Wealthfront, Backers Seeking $485M in IPO

headline: Is there an AI bubble? BlackRock, BofA don't seem to think so
summary: Wall Street has gone back and forth over whether the market (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) is in an AI bubble or not. BlackRock and Bank of America apparently have the answer: we're not in a bubble. Market Domination host Josh Lipton is joined by Yahoo Finance senior reporter Allie Canal to examine new AI outlooks from the two top Wall Street firms, including their consensus on the K-shaped economy. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Vanguard Will Now Allow Crypto ETFs on Its Platform
summary: Starting on Tuesday, Vanguard will allow ETFs and mutual funds that primarily hold select cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ether, XRP, and Solana, to be eligible for trading on its platform.  It’s a compromise that belies the firm’s long-standing view that digital assets are too volatile and speculative for serious portfolios and comes despite a more than $1 trillion drawdown in crypto market value since early October.

content.title: Vanguard Will Now Allow Crypto ETFs on Its Platform
content.summary: Starting on Tuesday, Vanguard will allow ETFs and mutual funds that primarily hold select cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ether, XRP, and Solana, to be eligible for trading on its platform.  It’s a compromise that belies the firm’s long-standing view that digital assets are too volatile and speculative for serious portfolios and comes despite a more than $1 trillion drawdown in crypto market value since early October.
